text: Activation of the human <extra_id_0> delta-globin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene promoter in primary adult erythroid cells .

Restoration of the CCAAT box or insertion of an <extra_id_0> erythroid Kruppel-like factor <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> EKLF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) binding site in the delta promoter activates its expression in several erythroid cell lines .
We extended these studies using a novel primary human adult erythroid cell ( hAEC ) system to investigate these effects at the late erythroblast stage .

Restoration of the CCAAT box at -70 bp , or insertion of an <extra_id_0> EKLF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> binding site at -85 bp or -95 bp in the promoter significantly increased <extra_id_0> delta globin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene expression in hAEC .

text: Our results demonstrate that the altered CCAAT box ( CCAAC ) and the lack of an <extra_id_0> EKLF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> binding site in <extra_id_0> delta-globin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> contribute to its low level of expression in the hAEC model as well .
